title: Climate Protester Glues His Head to ‘Girl With a Pearl Earring’ Painting
description: The artwork by Johannes Vermeer, exhibited in The Hague, was the latest artwork to be targeted by protesters concerned about climate change. One person glued his head to the painting and another glued his hand to the wall.
dc:creator: Christine Chung
media:credit: Lex Van Lieshout/Agence France-Presse, via Anp/Afp Via Getty Images
media:description: Johannes Vermeer’s painting “Girl with a Pearl Earring” joins Vincent van Gogh’s “Sunflowers” and Claude Monet’s “Grainstacks” as paintings targeted by climate activists.
